messages.title: REAL CHANGE for Sheffield
messages.content: Only local Lib Dem champion Paul Scriven can deliver REAL CHANGE for Sheffield. It's Lib Dem or Labour in Sheffield Central

mentions.tacticalSituation: More and more Conservative and Green supporters are backing Paul Scriven to beat Labour.

issues.education: EXPENSES SCANDAL, CRIME, POST OFFICE CLOSURES, FAILING SCHOOLS

images.caption: Only local Lib Dem champion Paul Scriven can deliver

leaflet.additionalNotes: Labour's failed party boss from Dore doesn't live locally, has no track record of delivering for Sheffield, and failed to stand up for us. Labour's record includes MPs voting for the Iraq War, voting to raise taxes on poorest, keeping expenses secret, voting to close 2,500 Post Offices, Council bosses ruining our road network, and Town Hall bosses let Council Tax rocket.
